column4: Anyone have a link on how to get Chrome working with Flash after Flash updates?...breaks Chrome on Linux almost everytime...Flash can be a real PITA. :)
just drop the plugin in the plugin directory and call the app with a few tags
sorry, i might have jumped the gun there

Well, this worked for me for a while, http://jeanderuelle.blogspot.com/2009/07/enable-flash-on-google-chrome-linux-dev.html  But once Flash updated it broke Google Chrome for Linux...just curious if anyone else has had this problem.
